EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Platform Roadshow - CenturyLink_Q215.Email Confirm - Atlanta
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed: Cloud Platform Seminar - Atlanta
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thursday, September 10, 2015 Tech on Fifth @ Technology Square
Georgia Tech Venture Center
75 Fifth Street, NW
Atlanta, GA 30308 Save the Date <https://d1fto35gcfffzn.cloudfront.net/event-promo/CloudPlatformSeminar-Atlanta.ics> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Platform Seminar.
Prior to the event, please create an account on Pivotal Network <http://network.pivotal.io>. To fully participate in the workshop, bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io>. AGENDA
8:30 AM - 9:10 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:10 AM - 10:00 AM Keynote
10:00 AM - 10:15 AM Coffee Break
10:15 AM - 11:15 AM Customer Use Case
11:15 AM - 11:30 AM Coffee Break
11:30 AM - 12:30 PM Session: Lab 1
12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Networking Lunch
1:30 PM - 4:00 PM Session: Lab 2
4:00 PM Wrap Up VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://pivotal.io/cloud-platform-seminar/atlanta>
